message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product and I think you'd really appreciate it. I'm asking for $110 for it. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $95?
Bob, I appreciate your offer but I'm not quite ready to go that low just yet. I'm willing to come down to $100. Let me know if you're interested at that price.
